model.gameoflife.algorithms

Interface Algorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Default

    public interface Algorithm
    Interface for implementing the Game Of Life algorithm

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beforeUpdate()
      Method that does necessary checking of edges and if we need to expand or shrink the game board
      void update()
      Method that runs the algorithm
      void updateConcurrent(int start, int stop, int clearStart, int clearStop, java.util.concurrent.CyclicBarrier barrier)
      Method that runs the algorithm multithreaded

    • Method Detail

      • beforeUpdate

        void beforeUpdate()
        Method that does necessary checking of edges and if we need to expand or shrink the game board

      • update

        void update()
        Method that runs the algorithm

      • updateConcurrent

        void updateConcurrent(int start,
                      int stop,
                      int clearStart,
                      int clearStop,
                      java.util.concurrent.CyclicBarrier barrier)
        Method that runs the algorithm multithreaded
        Parameters:
        start - The start position of the segment
        stop - The end position of the segment
        clearStart - The start of the clear neighbours method
        clearStop - The end of the clear neighbours method
        barrier - The CyclicBarrier to use in the algorithm
